val:
We’re taking a break from the lighter, personality topics this week to talk mental health with M Pease!

In this episode, we discuss how our intersecting identities shape our mental health. M also shares what it’s like to work as a Peer Counselor at the university’s help center and why there’s often barriers to accessing mental health resources like seeing a therapist 💬

Mental Health Crisis Resources & Hotlines:

  • National Suicide Prevention Lifeline
  • The Trevor Project
  • National Alliance on Mental Illness
  • Trans Lifeline

—⁣⁣
